text: Enjoyed speaking with @uspastorcouncil & @TempleChamber members and other Bell County community and business leaders today about my efforts to secure additional #PPP funding which would help provide crucial #SmallBizRelief and support #TX #SmallBiz owners. #teletour

Thanks to a $319,000 #PPPloan, #nonprofit @BGCSuncoast will retain over 50 employees & is able to continue coordinating outreach services in #PinellasCounty, #Florida. @BGCSuncoast offers tele-tutoring, case management services, & has provided over 40,000 meals for local youth.

The legacy of racial inequality—higher poverty rates, poor access to health care, housing discrimination—has left Black communities particularly vulnerable to COVID-19.

We're not just fighting back against a virus, but decades of structural racism.
